body {
  background:#E1D4C0 url("http://www.blogger.com/img/sides_body.png") repeat-y center top;
  margin:0;
  padding:40px 20px;
  font:x-small "Trebuchet MS" Georgia,Serif;
  text-align:center;
  color:#333;
  font-size/* */:/**/small;
  font-size: /**/small;
  }
a:link {
  color:#58a;
  text-decoration:none;
  }
a:visited {
  color:#969;
  text-decoration:none;
  }
a:hover {
  color:#c60;
  text-decoration:underline;
  }
a img {
  border-width:0;
  }


/* Header
----------------------------------------------- */
#header {
  margin:0 auto 10px;
  }
h1 {
  margin:5px 5px 0;
  padding:20px 0 .25em;
  font-size:200%;
  line-height:1.2em;
  font-weight:normal;
  color:#666;
  text-transform:uppercase;
  letter-spacing:.2em;
  }
h1 a, h1 a:visited {
  color:#666;
  text-decoration:none;
  }
h1 a:hover {
  color:#c60;
  }
#description {
  margin:0 5px 5px;

  padding:0 20px 20px;
  max-width:700px;
  font:78%/1.4em "Trebuchet MS",Trebuchet,Arial,Verdana,Sans-serif;
  text-transform:uppercase;
  letter-spacing:.2em;
  color:#999;
  }
.description {
	color:#999;
}

h2 {
  font-weight:normal;
  color:#666;
  text-transform:uppercase;
  letter-spacing:.2em;
  margin:10px 0;
}

/* Content
----------------------------------------------- */
#content {
  width:660px;
  margin:0 auto;
  padding:0;
  text-align:left;
  }
#main {
	margin:10px 0 0 0;
	padding:0 0 10px 0;
	border-top:1px solid #ccc;
}
#sidebar {
	width:auto;
	float:none;
	margin:10px 0 0 0;
	padding:10px 0 0 0;
	border-top:1px solid #ccc;
}

#main2 {
	position:relative;
	margin-top:10px;
}

#feedlink {
	position:absolute;
	top:0;
	right:0;
}

/* Posts
----------------------------------------------- */
.date-header {
  margin:5px 0 0;
  font:78%/1.4em "Trebuchet MS",Trebuchet,Arial,Verdana,Sans-serif;
  text-transform:uppercase;
  letter-spacing:.2em;
  color:#999;
  }

.date-header a, .date-header a:visited {
  color:#999;
}

#itembody .date-header {
  font-size:150%;

}
.post {
  margin:0em 0 2em;
  /*border-bottom:1px dotted #ccc;*/
  /*padding-bottom:1.5em;*/
  }
#mainbody .post, #archivebody .post {
	width:46%;
	padding:0 0 0 4%;
	float:left;
	margin-bottom:0em;
   overflow:hidden;
}
.post-title {
  margin:.25em 0 0;
  padding:0 0 4px;
  font-size:140%;
  font-weight:normal;
  line-height:1.1em;
  color:#c60;
  }
.post-title a, .post-title a:visited, .post-title strong {
  display:block;
  text-decoration:none;
  color:#c60;
  font-weight:normal;
  }
.post-title strong, .post-title a:hover {
  color:#333;
  }

#itembody .post-title {
  font-size:300%;
}
.post div {
  margin:0 0 .75em;
  line-height:1.6em;
  }

#itembody .post div {
  font-size:200%;
}
p.post-footer {
  margin:-.25em 0 0;
  color:#ccc;
  }
.post-footer em, .comment-link {
  font:78%/1.4em "Trebuchet MS",Trebuchet,Arial,Verdana,Sans-serif;
  text-transform:uppercase;
  letter-spacing:.1em;
  }
.post-footer em {
  font-style:normal;
  color:#999;
  margin-right:.6em;
  }
.comment-link {
  margin-left:.6em;
  }
.post img {
  padding:4px;
  border:1px solid #ddd;
  }
.post blockquote {
  margin:1em 20px;
  padding-left:8px;
  border-left:1px solid #c60;
  }
.post blockquote p {
  margin:.75em 0;
  }



/* Sidebar Content
----------------------------------------------- */
#sidebar ul {
  margin:6px 0 .5em;
  padding:0 0 .5em;
  list-style:none;
  }
#sidebar li {
  margin:0;
  padding:0 0 .25em 15px;
  text-indent:0px;
  line-height:1.4em;
  }
#sidebar p {
  margin:6px 0 .5em;
  padding:0 0 .25em 15px;
  line-height:1.4em;
  }

  margin:0 auto;
  }

  }

  }

  padding:0 0 .5em;
  list-style:none;
}

#archives {
	width:440px;
	float:left;
	padding:0 0 50px 0;
}

.archive-link {
	white-space:nowrap;
   display:block;

}

}

<body id="mainbody"><script type="text/javascript">
    function setAttributeOnload(object, attribute, val) {
      if(window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener("load",
          function(){ object[attribute] = val; }, false);
      } else {
        window.attachEvent('onload', function(){ object[attribute] = val; });
      }
    }
  </script>
<iframe src="http://www.blogger.com/navbar.g?targetBlogID=3024673&amp;blogName=Blogs+of+Note&amp;publishMode=PUBLISH_MODE_BLOGSPOT&amp;navbarType=BLUE&amp;layoutType=CLASSIC&amp;searchRoot=http%3A%2F%2Fblogsofnote.blogspot.com%2Fsearch&amp;blogLocale=en_US&amp;homepageUrl=http%3A%2F%2Fblogsofnote.blogspot.com%2F" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" height="30px" width="100%" id="navbar-iframe" allowtransparency="true" title="Blogger Navigation and Search"></iframe>
<div></div>




<div id="header">

  <h1 id="blog-title">
    
	Blogs of Note
	
  </h1>
  <p class="description">Interesting and noteworthy Blogger-powered blogs, compiled by the Blogger Team.<br />For historical context, see <em><a href="http://buzz.blogger.com/2006/03/concerning-historie-and-nature-of.html">Concerning the Historie and Nature of Blogs of Note</a>.</em></p>
  <p class="description"><a href="http://fusion.google.com/add?moduleurl=http%3A//www.blogger.com/gadgets/blogsofnote.xml"><img src="http://buttons.googlesyndication.com/fusion/add.gif" width="104" height="17" border="0" alt="Add to Google"></a></p>
</div>
